segments.text: Rachel ? I ’ m not sure how you want to handle this account . I think there are a few things to be sorted out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree , Toni . I think the biggest problem we ’ re facing is how to bring it in under budget .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s true . But even beyond that , there ’ s the question of meeting the deadlines they ’ Ve set .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Look , why don ’ t we make a list of the problems we ’ re dealing with . It ’ ll be easier to work through them that way .
segments.speaker: S2
